ygData.subject: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: OK don t get to excited but I have been asked by a fellow gnome to make the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust for me, but won t give up the npc
ygData.messageBody:
OK don't get to excited but I have been asked by a fellow gnome to make
the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust for me, but won't
give up the npc that drops it. He claims that the npc is 50th level and
that the diamond dust is a rare drop item off it. I am thinking that this
could mean that the npc may be in the planes but that is merley speculation.
I wish he would give up the info but he is keeping it hidden from all for
another gnome. Well i hope this gives all you tinkerers hope:) Has anyone
discovered what the formula is for the Thermal Cloak? Where can i aquire
tattered belts? Are they merely patchwork belts or are they actually called
Tattered belts?


Grudup PuddleJumperTinkertot.....Tallon Zek *80 skill*
